goals__remit:
ODAS GLOBAL CONSULTING LTD is a Romanian 
company which provides business management services to 
the highest quality standards. 
The company was founded in 2003 and since then has been 
dynamically envolving by offering a wide range of services, 
from business and management consultancy to governmental, structural and international funds consultancy and feasibility studies. 
Services: 
1. Investments services  
- Search and analyze various types of investments in areas such as tourism, agriculture, manufacturing factories and more; 
- Ensures all logistic support for the investors 
and for his partners to ensure a successful 
investment process; 
2. Business Services  
3. Structural Funds consultancy 
4. Financial consultancy
